str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.
A birthday celebration. Neuter plural of a derivative of genesis; birthday ceremonies.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a female child, or descendant.
From Herodes; Herodias, a woman of the Heodian family.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To dance. Middle voice from orchos; to dance.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To please, with the idea of willing service rendered to others; hence almost: I serve. Probably from airo; to be agreeable.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.
